::Shadow Wing::

Shoots at Ares and Sixshot.  Pulls out daggers and throws them at 
Sixshot and Ares.  
She yells at Serpentor, "NOT TODAY YOU SLAGGING SCRAP HEAPS!!!"
She throws a dagger at Serpentor aiming for his chest.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Inferno731@a... wrote:
> Ares points five guns at Prowl and five guns at ShadowWing and 
fires.
> Anubis and Koga Shuko fire at Torca.
> Sixshot divebombs at Prowl shoot.
> Hades attacks Striker in Beast Mode.
> Serpentor responds to Shadowings comment.
> Serpentor: Of course we want it..... DESTROYED!!!!!!!!!!
> Unitron fires at the Ark.
